name: Crop Disease Detector
short_description: Take a photo of your crop leaf to instantly identify diseases and get treatment recommendations in Hindi and English.
pain_point: Farmers often cannot identify crop diseases early, leading to significant yield loss
opportunity: Early disease detection can save up to 30% of crop yield
target_users: All farmers growing wheat, rice, potato, tomato, sugarcane, mustard, maize, and cotton
technical_approach: Simulated AI image analysis with comprehensive disease database
